global.title: U-Dig It AI Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Playbook
global.description: Framework for CRO strategies, A/B test ideas, and funnel tweaks to improve conversion rates.
global.guardrails: Changes must be tested before deployment. Avoid unverified claims of improvement.

landing_pages.description: Test gold vs. green CTA buttons.
Move testimonials above vs. below CTA.

checkout.description: Add secure checkout + refund guarantee near Stripe button.
Test urgency-based vs. bonus-based bump copy.

emails.description: Test short curiosity-driven vs. longer benefit-driven subject lines.
Test button vs. hyperlink CTAs in email body.

ads.description: Compare video ads vs. static images.
Test emotional vs. rational ad copy.

best_practices.sample_size: Minimum 500 visitors per variant before decision.
best_practices.duration: Run tests for at least 7 days to cover weekday/weekend variations.
best_practices.one_change_rule: Only test one major element per A/B test.

integration.reporting: All CRO test results logged in reporting_dashboard_spec.json.
integration.crm: Tag leads/customers by variant for lifecycle analysis (see crm_automation_playbook.json).
